summary: This mod adds a standalone follower.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]https://c1.staticflickr.com/9/8114/28895088614_939c33213f_b.jpg[/img]




[color=#cc0000][size=4]If you want to use the MCM in v1.1 - [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/3863/?]SkyUI[/url] and Latest [url=http://skse.silverlock.org/]SKSE[/url] are required[/size][/color]


[color=#a2c4c9][size=3][My other mods][/size][/color]
[spoiler]
[Replacers]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/40038/?]Bijin Warmaidens[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/63473/?]Bijin Wives[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/71054/?]Bijin NPCs[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/38326/?]Seranaholic[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/61140?]Toccata as Elisif[/url]

[Follower mods]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/61140?]Toccata[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/37869/?]Chaconne[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/74256/?]Minerva - Custom High Elf Voiced Follower[/url] (Face design by me)
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/81958/?]Succubus-san[/url]
[/spoiler]

[color=#a2c4c9][size=3][Summary][/size][/color]

She is a standalone follower which means no other mods will be required.
You can use this mod without any problem whatever body you're using.


[color=#d0e0e3]Name[/color] : Vivace

[color=#d0e0e3]Race[/color] : Nord

[color=#d0e0e3]Marriable[/color] : Yes

[color=#d0e0e3]Location[/color] : Nightgate Inn

[color=#d0e0e3]Skill[/color] : You can customize it in MCM(from v1.1)

[color=#d0e0e3]Default outfit[/color] : [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53442/?]zzjay's wardrobe[/url] (Thank you so much!)

[color=#d0e0e3]Voice[/color] : You can choose it from all voices on the installation([color=#d5a6bd]You can choose it in MCM menu anytime from v1.1[/color])

[color=#d0e0e3]Body[/color] : You can choose it on the installation

[color=#d0e0e3]Weight[/color] : 70 (there is 100 option for the neck gap)

[color=#d0e0e3]Combat style[/color] : You can customize it in MCM(from v1.1)


---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

[color=#cc0000][size=3][How to Update]

[/size][/color]To [color=#d5a6bd]v1.1[/color] from v1.0

Follow these steps:

[1]
Retrieve all of her items that you don't want to possibly lose and dismiss her, if she's currently following you.

[2]
Make sure you and Vivace are not in the same cell
(either wait, sleep, change cells yourself, or wait for her to walk out of the current cell).

[3]
Make a new save. Wait 3-5 seconds, then make another new save. Then quit the game.

[4]
Uninstall v1.0, then install v1.1.

[5]
Launch Skyrim and load your newest save. If you receive notifications and a map marker on Vivace, v1.1 has been installed and is ready.

=== [color=#d5a6bd]If the MCM does not immediately appear, just wait for a bit and it will show up.[/color] ===



[color=#cc0000][size=3][How to apply Weight 100 option to her in game]

[/size][/color][1]
Open console and click her precisely

[2]
Type "setnpcweight 100"
(her face will be broken but ignore it)

[3]
Type "disable" and "enable"

[4]
Done.


------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

[color=#a2c4c9][size=3][Recommended mods][/size][/color]

[size=3]Any of the follower overhaul mods(such as AFT, EFF etc).
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35303/?]Female Facial Animation[/url] by nao4288   [color=#cc0000]Highly recommended[/color]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/74568/?]Relationship Dialogue Overhaul - RDO[/url] by cloudedtruth  [color=#cc0000]Highly recommended[/color][/size]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30533/?]Face to face conversation[/url] by towawot

[size=3]
If you choose the Female Sultry Voice[/size]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/74568/?]Relationship Dialogue Overhaul - RDO[/url] by  cloudedtruth
Or [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/71869/?]Female Sultry Follower Voice Fix[/url] by  cloudedtruth



[color=#a2c4c9][size=2][Mods used in the screenshots][/size][/color]

Tweaked FeverNB
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/23812/?]Seasons of Skyrim ENB True HDR[/url] by Bronze316
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/41482/?]Rudy ENB[/url] by Rudy102 (Dof is from Snapdragon enb)
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/43609/?]Osare Culort Outfit - UNP[/url] by anano
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53442/?]zzjay's wardrobe[/url] by zzjay
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/48652/?]Eldrids Armor Mashup UNP[/url] by anka01
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/38053/?]Northgirl Armor UNP and the Retexture from clethcleth and Gamwich[/url] by anka01


[color=#a2c4c9][Related mod]
[/color]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68985/?]Vivace Customizer[/url] by ClearanceClarence

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

[color=#a2c4c9][size=3][Q&A][/size][/color]
[spoiler]

[color=#a2c4c9]Q[/color] : She has the neck gap even though I chose weight 100.
[color=#a2c4c9]A[/color] :
[1]
Open console and click her precisely
[2]
Type "setnpcweight 100". Her face will be broken but ignore it and 
[3]
Type "disable" and "enable"
[4]
Done.

[color=#d0e0e3]Q[/color] : She looks like UNP even though I chose CBBE.
[color=#d0e0e3]A[/color] : Because her default outfit is made based on UNP. Please give her new outfit made for CBBE

[color=#d0e0e3]Q[/color] : She looks ugly in my game
[color=#d0e0e3]A[/color] : Try ENB(my recommendation is Seasons of Skyrim ENB)
or try [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/17416/?]Wearable Lanterns[/url] or [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/73473/?]Quick Light[/url] if you don't want to use enb

[color=#d0e0e3]Q[/color] : I want her face preset
[color=#d0e0e3]A[/color] : Try [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/61436/?]How to apply any custom NPC's face to your character with Racemenu 3.0[/url] by Poro Plush

[color=#d0e0e3]Q[/color] : Custom voice?
[color=#d0e0e3]A[/color] : ^^;

[color=#d0e0e3]Q[/color] : I want to change her body
[color=#d0e0e3]A[/color] : See below
[/spoiler]


[color=#cc0000][size=3][How to change body type to your liking][/size][/color]
[spoiler]
[1]
Copy the following 2 body meshes which you want to use from body mod.
If you want to use the same body as the player character, copy from
Data/meshes/actors/character/character assets/here

femalebody_0
femalebody_1

[2]
Overwrite Vivace meshes Data/meshes/actors/character/Vivace/here by [1]'s files.
*Copy and overwrite the following files as well if the hands and feet have any seams on her.

femalefeet_0
femalefeet_1
femalehands_0
femalehands_1

[3]
Done.

*You have to change their skin textures as well by yourself
if you want to use the special body which doesn't correspond to UNP or CBBE textures.
Skin textures are 
Data/textures/actors/character/Vivace/here, so you just replace these files if you want to change.
[/spoiler]

[color=#a2c4c9][The solution when "No More Ugly Bronze Shine" mod doesn't affect to her][/color][/center][center][spoiler]
Overwrite the following files by that mod's files.

femalebody_1_sk.dds
femalehands_1_sk.dds
femalehead_sk.dds

[1]
Download that mod manually

[2]
Choose 01 - UNP A or 02 - CBBE A (I think whatever is fine as long as it's written UNP or CBBE).

[3]
Pick up 3 files written above and overwrite Data/textures/actors/character/Vivace/here
[/spoiler]

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------


[color=#a2c4c9][size=3][Credits][/size][/color]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36425/?]Real Girls Realistic Body Texture for UNP UNPB and SeveNBase[/url] by Zonzai and Seren4XX
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/55761/?]Real Girls Realistic Body Texture for CBBE[/url] (Beta) by drunkenmojo
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/32986/?]Mature skin texture and body for UNP(B) 7BASE CBBE Vanilla[/url] by Maevan2
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51602/?]Fair Skin Complexion[/url] by HHaleyy
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/73853/?]PureSkinTexture[/url] by Anini n Regenbot03
SG Female Textures and More by HelloSanta
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/35267//?]SG Female Textures Renewal[/url] by Hello Santa
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12951/?]Enhanced Character Edit[/url] by tktk
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6709/?]DIMONIZED UNP female body[/url] by dimon99
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2666//?]Calientes Female Body Mod Big Bottom Edition -CBBE-[/url] by Caliente
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13722/?]The Eyes Of Beauty[/url] by Gabriel Mailhot
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27783/?]HN66s Long Eye Lashes[/url] by humannature66
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/31665/?]Better Makeup for SKSE[/url] by Diethardt
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/24273/?]Ethereal Elven Overhaul[/url] by nuska
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68311/?]KS Hairdos - Renewal[/url] by Kalilies Stealthic Khaos and Shocky
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/22701/?]Seductive Lips HD[/url][b] [/b]by EcthelionOtW
High Poly Hands and Feet for UNP bodies by Halofarm v1.0
Robton for tweaking hair mesh

[color=#d5a6bd][size=3]Thank you very much great modders![/size]

[/color][size=2]
[/size][/center]
[youtube]qNutQLsiTk4[/youtube][youtube]Slz5MMo37CE[/youtube]
author: rxkx22 and cloudedtruth

files.name: Vivace Follower 1.1
files.changelogHtml:
New head mesh, skin textures, and makeup.


Added a MCM for complete control and customization of her combat behavior. Control which spells she can use, how aggressive or passively she fights, what she prefers to fight with in combat (weapons, spells, bow+arrow, staffs, unarmed/fists), and change her class to make her more proficient in the skills you want her to be.

MCM includes a map marker, allowing you to always know where she is (can be toggled on or off).

files.name: Vivace 1.1.2
files.changelogHtml: Minor update of her face model and skin textures. Updating is up to you if you're satisfied with her current face.
